# Stack Module

A simple stack implementation in Python.

## Installation

Simply download the `apsstack.py` file.

## Usage

```python
from apsstack import *
# Push items
#list iteam only allowed
print(push([1,2,3,4,5,6,7]))
# Peek at the top item
print(peek())

# Pop items
print(pop())
print(pop())  # Stack is Empty

# Check length
print(length())
